# Script to load the data and perform QC
```
library(oligo)
list = list.files(full.names=TRUE)
data = oligo::read.celfiles(list)
ph = data@phenoData
ph
ph$sample
ph$data
feat = data@featureData
feat
feat@data

ph@data[ ,1] = c("daGal4_01","daGal4_Dif_RNAi_01","pink1_daGal4_Relish_RNAi_01","daGal4_02","daGal4_Dif_RNAi_02",
                 "pink1_daGal4_Relish_RNAi_02","daGal4_03","daGal4_Dif_RNAi_03","pink1_daGal4_Relish_RNAi_03",
                 "daGal4_04","daGal4_Dif_RNAi_04","pink1_daGal4_Relish_RNAi_04","daGal4_Relish_RNAi_01",
                 "pink1_daGal4_01","pink1_daGal4_Dif_RNAi_01","daGal4_Relish_RNAi_02","pink1_daGal4_02",
                 "pink1_daGal4_Dif_RNAi_02","daGal4_Relish_RNAi_03","pink1_daGal4_03","pink1_daGal4_Dif_RNAi_03",
                 "daGal4_Relish_RNAi_04","pink1_daGal4_04","pink1_daGal4_Dif_RNAi_04")
ph
```
